note.p: Barrister. BA, Cambridge University, 1828. Called to the bar, 1832. In the later part of his life, lived at Constable Burton, Bedale, Yorkshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1148/22/42)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 April 2018)
